title: 2018 820-01521 No image
message:
Purchased this A1932 with a broken screen The crack is minor seems like i should still get an image, back light does turn on.
I disconnected the internal display and tried with an external display but cant get an image .
I have tested this setup with a A1534 and the external display will work with that.
Any suggestions to check if this is a bad Display or Logic board problem? i do not have another display to test with unfortunately.

title: 2018 820-01521 No image
message:
Did you look at logic board, no liquid sign?
Possible cracked traces, if machine was dropped.

title: 2018 820-01521 No image
message: No signs of liquid damage. No signs of a drop looks like the crack was from something hitting the lcd its self. Not even a scratch on the body.

title: 2018 820-01521 No image
message: Backlight presence should mean board is booting, but is better to confirm USB activity.

title: 2018 820-01521 No image
message: Caps lock key lights up , track pad is activated and usb activity confirmed .

title: 2018 820-01521 No image
message:
Crack is minor , usually I see a lot more cracks to not see an image.
cant explain why no external video though maybe it does not like my external display

title: 2018 820-01521 No image
message:
Try another HDMI adapter.
Best way to test with known good working compatible LCD assembly.

title: 2018 820-01521 No image
message: Yeah will have to wait until i find one. Have you replaced many of these displays, is there any issue with the T2 chip?

title: 2018 820-01521 No image
message:
I never replaced one.
As I understood, no T2 issue...

title: 2018 820-01521 No image
message: Just an update, As i thought it didnt like my old monitor its weird though because it works with a A1706 and A1534. Purchased a newer USB C monitor and it is now displaying an image with that.

title: 2018 820-01521 No image
message: Is time to test with 100% compatible LCD assembly...
